description: This file contains test cases for the 'agent' module, specifically testing user input flows in the context of tools requiring user input, including synchronous and asynchronous scenarios, stream handling, and session continuation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of running tasks with tools and managing user input flows.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from the agent after a run, including status, results, and tool states.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input
methods.description: Tests that a tool requiring user input pauses execution until input is provided, then continues.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input_specific_fields
methods.description: Tests that specific user input fields are correctly handled and passed to the tool.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming responses where user input is required, ensuring proper pause and resume behavior.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input_async
methods.description: Asynchronous version of user input requirement test, verifying async behavior.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input_stream_async
methods.description: Async streaming test for user input requirement, ensuring correct pause/resume in async context.

methods.name: test_tool_call_requires_user_input_continue_with_run_id
methods.description: Tests continuing a paused session with a run ID, verifying state persistence and continuation.

methods.name: test_tool_call_multiple_requires_user_input
methods.description: Tests multiple tools requiring user input within a single interaction, ensuring correct handling.
